tuple(string memory[] memory,string memory[] memory,uint256[] memory,string memory[] memory,uint256[] memory,address[] memory)

addRecord(address,string,string,string,u.details: Adds a new detailed healthcare record for a specified patient. Only callable by registered Doctors.

params._cause: The cause for which the drug was prescribed.
params._dataHash: The IPFS CID of the full medical data (e.g., full report)
params._description: A brief description of the record.
params._drugUsed: The name of the drug used.
params._patientAddress: The Ethereum address of the patient.
params._quantity: The quantity of the drug used.

getDrugDetailsForManufacturer(address).details: Retrieves drug-specific details from all records for a patient. This function is specifically for Drug Manufacturers.

params._patientAddress: The Ethereum address of the patient.

returns.creators: An array of addresses of the creators.
returns.dataHashes: An array of IPFS CIDs for the medical data.
returns.drugUsedList: An array of drug names used.
returns.timestamps: An array of timestamps when records were added.

getMyRole().details: Gets the role of the caller.

returns._0: The UserRole enum value of the caller.

getPatientRecords(address).details: Retrieves all healthcare records for a specific patient, with role-based access. - Patients can only view their own records. - Doctors and InsuranceCompanies can view any patient's full records. - Drug Manufacturers can NOT use this function to view full records; they have a dedicated function for drug details.

params._patientAddress: The Ethereum address of the patient.

returns._0: An array of PatientRecord structs associated with the given patient.

getUser(address).details: Gets the details of a specific user. Used for login verification and displaying user info.

params._userAddress: The address of the user to query.

registerUser(address,string,uint8).details: Registers a new user with a specified role. This function is intended to be called by an *authorized* entity (e.g., your backend) after a user signs up via Firebase Auth. It links the wallet address to a role on-chain.

params._role: The UserRole enum value for the new user.
params._userAddress: The Ethereum address of the user being registered.
params._username: A string username for the user.
